name: mymind
description: mymind is a private, AI-enhanced platform for saving and organizing notes, bookmarks, images, and articles effortlessly.
longDescription: mymind is an innovative digital platform designed to act as an extension of your memory, allowing users to save and retrieve notes, bookmarks, images, articles, and more in a private, intuitive space. It leverages artificial intelligence to automatically organize content without requiring manual categorization, making it ideal for creatives, researchers, and anyone seeking a clutter-free way to store information. The platform emphasizes privacy, ensuring no tracking, ads, or social features interfere with the user experience. By offering a distraction-free environment and powerful search capabilities, mymind helps users focus on their ideas and inspirations. Its mission is to simplify personal knowledge management, enabling users to spend less time organizing and more time engaging with what matters to them.
features: AI-driven organization automatically sorts saved content like notes, images, and articles, eliminating the need for manual tagging or folders.
Visual bookmarking allows users to save web content, such as images and articles, with a single click for easy access later.
Powerful search functionality lets users find saved items instantly using keywords, colors, brands, or dates.
Smart Spaces auto-sort content based on user-defined criteria, creating personalized collections effortlessly.
Distraction-free reading mode strips ads and pop-ups from saved articles, enhancing focus and readability.
Image text recognition enables users to search for text within saved images or screenshots using OCR technology.
Moodboard generation creates visual inspiration boards from saved images in seconds, ideal for designers and creatives.
Offline access (beta) provides read-only access to saved content without an internet connection, improving usability.
Rich text note editor supports markdown, todo lists, and formatting for seamless note-taking.
Movie bookmarking automatically formats saved film pages with posters, enhancing the experience for film enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What is mymind used for?
faqs.answer: mymind is a private platform for saving and organizing notes, bookmarks, images, articles, and videos, using AI to automate organization and simplify retrieval.

faqs.question: Is mymind free to use?
faqs.answer: mymind offers a free plan with limited features, while premium plans like the Bookmarker or Student plans unlock additional functionality.

faqs.question: How does mymind organize my content?
faqs.answer: mymind uses AI to automatically tag and categorize saved items, allowing users to find content via intuitive searches without manual organization.

faqs.question: Can I access mymind offline?
faqs.answer: mymind offers a beta offline mode for read-only access to your saved content, which can be enabled in the app settings.

faqs.question: Does mymind support mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, mymind has dedicated iOS and Android apps, enabling users to save and access content on the go.

faqs.question: Is my data private on mymind?
faqs.answer: mymind prioritizes privacy with no tracking, ads, or social features, ensuring your data remains secure and private.

faqs.question: Can I save movies or books to mymind?
faqs.answer: Yes, mymind supports bookmarking movies and books, automatically formatting them with posters or covers for a visually appealing experience.

faqs.question: What is a Smart Space in mymind?
faqs.answer: Smart Spaces are user-defined collections that automatically sort saved content based on criteria like tags or types, streamlining organization.
